In Mayan times, this was a sanctuary devoted to the goddess of the moon,...
...fertility, healing and the feminine forces of nature.
And it's just a quick half-hour ferry ride from Cancun.
Once here, you can take in the whole island...
...from behind the wheel of a golf cart.
Just a little further up the coast is Garrafon de Castilla.
This natural reef is known for its incredible beauty and roster of fun.
The zip line here is awesome.
The turquoise color below me is so stunning, it looks like a special effect.
